services.title: VOD Review
services.subtitle: Expert breakdown of your gameplay
features: Expert breakdown of your gameplay
Spot hidden mistakes pros notice instantly
Clear action steps for your next ranked match
Budget-friendly way to test coaching before committing
services.description: Get a detailed analysis of your recorded gameplay with timestamped feedback and personalized improvement plans.

services.title: Intro Coaching Session
services.subtitle: Live 1-on-1 session with personalized advice
features: Live 1-on-1 session with personalized advice
Learn smarter crosshair placement, angles, and peeks
Map awareness drills so you stop "dying for free"
Perfect for Gold–Plat players stuck in a cycle
services.description: Perfect introduction to coaching with a focused 1-hour session covering fundamentals and personalized feedback.

services.title: Standard Coaching
services.subtitle: 2 hours of focused live coaching
features: 2 hours of focused live coaching (aim, utility, rotations)
Written improvement plan to track your growth
Identify your personal "rank blockers"
Great for players serious about hitting Diamond–Immortal
services.description: Comprehensive coaching session with extended time for deep dives into specific areas and written improvement plans.

services.title: Duo Queue Coaching
services.subtitle: Play ranked with me guiding every decision
features: Play ranked with me guiding every decision
Real-time callouts, rotations, and clutch mindset coaching
Learn from live comms — not just theory
Ideal if you want improvement and rank gains at the same time
services.description: Learn while climbing! Play ranked games together with live coaching and real-time feedback on every decision.

services.title: Weekly Coaching Program
services.subtitle: Structured weekly improvement program
features: 2x live 1hr sessions (deep dives per week)
1x VOD review included for extra analysis
Custom training plan (aim routines, utility lineups, mental prep)
Accountability – I track your progress, not just leave you guessing
services.description: Structured weekly program with multiple sessions, VOD reviews, and custom training plans for consistent improvement.

services.title: Rank Accelerator Bootcamp
services.subtitle: 5-6 duo sessions designed for fast climbing
features: 5–6 duo sessions designed for fast climbing
Tailored feedback after each game
Drills + mental coaching to handle pressure games
Climb faster while learning the skills to STAY there
Most cost-effective if you're serious about Immortal+
services.description: Intensive bootcamp designed for serious players who want to accelerate their rank progression with focused duo sessions.

bundles.title: VOD Review Bundle
bundles.subtitle: 3 VOD reviews for the price of 2.5
bundles.description: Perfect for players who want multiple VOD reviews to track their improvement over time.

bundles.title: Duo Queue Bundle
bundles.subtitle: 3 duo sessions for the price of 2.5
bundles.description: Great value for players who want to learn through multiple duo sessions.

bundles.title: Mega Duo Bundle
bundles.subtitle: 10 duo sessions for maximum value
bundles.description: Best value for serious players committed to long-term improvement through duo coaching.

categories.name: Individual Sessions
categories.description: One-time coaching sessions for specific needs
